text: George Siao Kian Ty (, 18 October 1932 – 23 November 2018) was a Filipino banker and business magnate. He founded Metropolitan Bank and Trust Company. He was born in Hong Kong. Ty had a net worth of $2.5 billion (September 2018). Ty died on 23 November 2018 in Manila, Philippines from pancreatic cancer at the age of 86.George Ty dies ‘surrounded by loved ones and family’ ==References== Category:1932 births Category:2018 deaths Category:Businesspeople from Manila Category:Cancer deaths in the Philippines
title: George Ty
